short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collaboratively annotate, highlight web NXP.com pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension for NXP internal use only.
Send feedback, collaboratively annotate, highlight, and tag web pages.
Use the extension to send feedback to specific teams using the visited URL.
You can see other users' annotations in the web.
